repository.summary: Main repository of openSUSE 12.3 including only Open Source Software
repository.description: The big Open Source Software (OSS) repository for openSUSE 12.3, giving you access to thousands of packages maintained by the openSUSE team. (Due to the size of the repository, adding it may take some time. 512 MB of RAM or an enabled SWAP partition are highly recommended in case you want to access this repository at installation time.)

repository.summary: Non-Open Source Software Addon repository for openSUSE 12.3
repository.description: The official openSUSE 12.3 repository for all Non-Open Source Software maintained by the openSUSE team, including Opera, Java, Flash, and more.
